subject: Request to Add Items to Existing Order #SSN1609
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

I recently received the Plus X from my order and am very happy with it, 
thank you!

Since the VAM Pro's haven't been shipped yet, I wanted to ask if it's 
possible to add a set of 30HA white elastomers and a yellow spring to 
the same shipment. This way, they could be delivered together, and we 
could potentially save on shipping costs.

Thank you in advance, and I look forward to your reply.

Kind regards,
Chris
-- 
Nextgen Computing GmbH | nextgen.ch

the operations team.
